sentences.sContent: Whether the legend is true or not, the discovery of coffee dates back to 800 A.D. when Africans created a coffee-berry pulp.
sentences.sContent_eng: Whether the legend is true or not, the discovery of coffee dates back to 800 A.D. when Africans created a coffee-berry pulp.
sentences.sCn: 不论这个传说是真是假，咖啡的发现要回溯到公元800年，那时非洲人制造出了一种咖啡浆果浆。

words.tran: 有卵的；结浆果的；浆果状的

trans.tranOther: a small soft fruit with small seeds
